name: SEA SCOUTER

images.alt: Sea Scouter Dinghy photo on sailboatdata.com

notes:
Designed for use by the Sea Scouts in Seattle,WA (USA)
Renamed SEA SCOOTER(w/molded interior seats (>hull # 2800) increased the hull weight to 190 lbs.)
An optional 25 sq. ft. jib and 55 sq. ft. spinnaker were also available.
Thanks to 'Christine' for providing information and brochure.
